Kabuto ist bereit, Tsukumo zu retten.

source:
TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_01Kabuto has every intention of rescuing Tsukumo, but he cannot do it alone. First, he must enlist the aid of his fellow Kojin. As he musters the courage to do so, he asks you to accompany him in case he should falter.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_01 Schwierigkeitsanpassung (Job/Klasse darf nicht gewechselt werden)

Kabuto ist entschlossen, Wellengeneral Hirumaki zum Kampf zu stellen und Tsukumo nach Tamamizu zurückzuholen. Doch zuerst muss er seine Stammesmitglieder überzeugen, ihm zu helfen. Hilf ihm dabei.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_02<tab>One of Kabuto's brothers agrees to help much to his surprise. Though only a small success, it gives him courage. So much so, he asks you to wait with Bunchin while he takes on the monumental task of speaking with all the Kojin of Tamamizu.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_02<tab>Kabuto gelingt es, den ersten Blaupanzer für seine Sache zu gewinnen. Er ist auf dem richtigen Weg. Du kannst nun ruhigen Gewissens bei dem Stammesältesten Bunchin warten, bis Kabuto zurückkehrt.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_03<tab>Kabuto has done his due diligence and spoken with all his brothers. All that remains is to wait. Then wait. Then wait a while longer. Just as he was beginning to lose hope, the other members of the Divine Circle arrive. They each have taken steps to prepare for the upcoming battle, and their remaining brothers are all at the ready outside of Tamamizu. It is time for battle, and so Kabuto bids you follow him to the Dive.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_03<tab>Es geht los! Ihr stürmt Zekki, um Wellengeneral Hirumaki am Platz der Schätze zu stellen und Tsukumo nach Tamamizu zurückzuholen. Triff Kabuto am Eingang zum Lager der Rotpanzer auf Zekki, knapp unter der Wasser<var 16 /var>ober<var 16 /var>fläche.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_04<tab>The plan to distract the Red Kojin about the island was a success. The entrance is unguarded, and Kabuto is prepared to rush inside.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_04<tab>Ihr seid in das Lager der Rotpanzer eingedrungen! Die anderen Kojin hatten Erfolg mit ihrem Ablenkungsmanöver, aber zwischen euch und dem Platz der Schätze stehen immer noch ein paar kräftige Rotpanzer. Schlage dich durch, damit Kabuto den Wellengeneral zum Kampf stellen kann!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_05<tab>Together you and Kabuto fight your way through to the Air of the Opulent and at last find Tsukumo held captive by Hirumaki. A duel ensues, and the ringing of steel against steel is deafening. Alas, Kabuto appears to be no match for Hirumaki. The red-shelled swordsman prepares to deliver the finishing blow when Tsukumo struggles to speak. He offers a few words of encouragement before growing still, and Kabuto realizes at once what has happened. He then finds the strength to strike one last time. Hirumaki collapses to the ground, but Kabuto follows shortly after. With the general defeated, the other Blue Kojin carry the unmoving Tsukumo and Kabuto back to Tamamizu.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_05<tab>Kabuto hat Hirumaki besiegt und ihr habt Tsukumo zurückerobert. Er scheint aber in keiner guten Verfassung zu sein. Kehre nach Tamamizu zurück.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_06<tab>Tsukumo is no more. The doll sits silently on an altar in the treasure vault when Shihoumi arrives to examine it. Kabuto's hopes of saving Tsukumo are dashed, however, when she tells him there is nothing she can do. Feeling defeated, Kabuto casts a sullen look at the altar and notices a peculiar gem on the ground. Shihoumi is quick to identify it as materia, and wastes no time affixing it to Kabuto's helmet. Taking the materia as a parting gift, he vows to honor Tsukumo's memory by redoubling his efforts to serve the Divine Circle.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SEQ_06<tab>Kabuto hat sich von dem Kampf erholt, aber Tsukumo ist nicht mehr derselbe. Die Kojin-Marionette bewegt sich nicht mehr, doch aus ihrem Inneren fällt eine Materia-Perle heraus. Enthält sie die Gedanken und Erfahrungen des Tsukumo-Kami? Shihomi befestigt die Perle an Kabutos Muschelhelm, was dem mutigen Krieger neue Energie zu geben scheint. Kabuto ist entschlossen, sich weiter der Schatzkammer von Tamamizu zu widmen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_001<tab>I'm afraid you've arrived early, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There is still much to do before preparations are complete.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_001<tab>Ich will Tsukumo retten. Schnell. Aber die anderen sind noch nicht<var 1D /var>...... so weit.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_002<tab>Yet I cannot stop thinking about Tsukumo's capture. Why strike in Kugane rather than here in Tamamizu? There is little we could have done to stop them had they tried.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_002<tab>Und ich habe<var 1D /var>...... nachgedacht. Die Rotpanzer sind uns im direkten Kampf überlegen. Aber sie haben Tsukumo mit einer feigen List geraubt. Warum haben sie nicht Tamamizu angegriffen?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_003<tab>Unless... What if this was not the work of the Red as a whole, but a plot by Hirumaki to satisfy his own greed?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_003<tab>Die Antwort ist: Hirumaki handelt auf eigene<var 1D /var>...... Faust.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_004<tab>Defeating him would be the key to rescuing Tsukumo.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_004<tab>Hirumaki muss weg.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_005<tab>The problem, however, is he is always so heavily guarded.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_005<tab>Im Zweikampf kann ich ihn bezwingen. Doch er versteckt sich hinter den Panzern seiner<var 1D /var>...... Krieger.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_006<tab>Our plans and preparation will all be for nothing unless they can be drawn away.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_006<tab>Wenn sie jemand weglocken könnte<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_007<tab>As ever your aid is greatly appreciated.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_007<tab>Ich danke dir. Du hast den Mut eines<var 1D /var>...... Kojin-Kriegers.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_008<tab>Nevertheless, we cannot deny their numbers. Sheer strength alone will not grant us victory.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_008<tab>Aber für <var 08 E905 ((eine)) ((einen)) /var> alleine sind es zu viele. Sie würden dich<var 1D /var>...... überrennen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_009<tab>The other members of the Divine Circle intend to create a distraction to draw them away, but even then we are still outmatched.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_009<tab>Unser Zirkel. Zukin, Makura und Shikitahe. Zusammen könnten sie Hirumakis Leibgarde und die Rotpanzer von Zekki<var 1D /var>...... ablenken.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_010<tab><sigh> How am I to sway my brothers to join us? Even the mere mention of the Isle of Zekki is enough to turn them away.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_010<tab>Ich muss mir noch etwas ausdenken, wie wir sie dazu bringen können, mitzumachen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_Q1_000_000<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_A1_000_001<tab>You must convince them with your actions.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_A1_000_001<tab>Lass deine Erscheinung für dich sprechen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_A1_000_002<tab>You must convince them with a thorough explanation of your plan.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_A1_000_002<tab>Überrede sie einfach mit einem eloquenten Vortrag!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_011<tab>My actions...? Ah, like the Qestir of the Azim Steppe.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_011<tab>Ein entschlossener Blick sagt mehr als tausend Worte. Ganz so, wie es bei den<var 1D /var>...... Qestir Sitte ist<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_012<tab>Hmmm. That sounds like what Tsukumo would do. He always had a way with words.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_012<tab>Einen Plan schmieden und ihn erklären. So wie<var 1D /var>...... Tsukumo es immer tut<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_013<tab>If that is what you believe, then I suppose it is worth a try.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_013<tab>Verstanden. Ich traue deinen<var 1D /var>...... Worten. So mache ich es.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_014<tab>Erm... Would you be willing to accompany me? Not to speak with everyone, of course. Only until I've gained my nerve.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_014<tab>Begleite mich.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_019<tab>Aren't you the one aiding the Divine Circle in their search for treasure? You've done fine work for the Blue. Yes, fine work indeed.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_019<tab>Du bist <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> <var 09 E948 ((Hyuran)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafell)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> unsere Schatzkammer mit seltenen Kostbarkeiten füllt? Lass mich dir<var 1D /var>...... danken.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_020<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your presence is greatly appreciated. Ahem. Now then.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_020<tab>Danke, dass du mitkommst. Ich bin mir nicht sicher, wie ich es anstellen<var 1D /var>...... soll.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_021<tab>Are you well, Kabuto? It's rather unlike you to call on anyone for help. I suppose next Makura will tell us the striped rays are drowning.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_021<tab>Was willst du von mir, Kabuto? Das muss das erste Mal sein, dass du mich<var 1D /var>...... ansprichst.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_022<tab>Tsukumo has been taken by the Red, and I mean to rescue him.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_022<tab>Die Rotpanzer haben Tsukumo<var 1D /var>...... geraubt. Wir werden nach Zekki schwimmen, um ihn zurückzuholen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_023<tab>So it is true! I had hoped it was only a rumor. But what are we to do? We are not fighters, Kabuto. You would be leading turtles to slaughter.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_023<tab>Der Tsukumo-Kami? Und du willst, dass ich<var 1D /var>...... kämpfe? Die Rotpanzer sind es gewohnt, auf dem Kriegspfad zu sein, doch wir Blaupanzer<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_024<tab>I realize that, which is why I will not ask you to fight. But I do have a plan that requires your help.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_024<tab>Hör dir doch erstmal den Plan an. Das Kämpfen übernehme ich. Aber ich brauche tapfere Unterstützer, die die Kräfte des Feindes<var 1D /var>...... zerstreuen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_025<tab>You are perhaps the greatest swimmer the Ruby Sea has ever known, and your knowledge of its currents is unmatched. That is why I would ask you to lead their soldiers on a chase─distract them that I might do battle with their leader alone.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_025<tab>Du bist einer unserer besten<var 1D /var>...... Schwimmer. Neulich bist du sogar einem Streifenrochen davongeschwommen! Und du kennst die Strömungen um Zekki wie kein Zweiter. Wenn du dabei bist, können wir die Roten weglocken, ohne uns wirklich in Gefahr<var 1D /var>...... zu begeben.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_026<tab>A chase, you say? Hmmm. It should be simple enough to drag those sea slugs through the waves. It might even prove fun.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_026<tab>Du weißt von dem Rennen mit dem Streifenrochen? Ja, dein Plan könnte<var 1D /var>...... funktionieren. Es könnte sogar Spaß machen, die Roten zum Narren zu halten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_027<tab>Very well. Give me time to prepare and you will have your diversion.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_000_027<tab>Kabuto, ich bin dabei! Gib mir nur etwas Zeit, mich<var 1D /var>...... vorzubereiten.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_028<tab>He listened. He listened and agreed to help! No doubt your presence helped to convince him.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_028<tab>Er kommt mit. Es<var 1D /var>...... funktioniert.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_029<tab>But I cannot ask you to be present for everyone. Wait with the elder while I speak with the others.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_029<tab>Ich werde jetzt zu den anderen gehen. Warte du beim Ältesten auf<var 1D /var>...... mich.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_029<tab>Kabuto has taken to recruiting our brothers for his attack on the Isle of Zekki? It seems he has learned much from his time away from Tamamizu.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_029<tab>Kabuto macht sich. Er hat viel von dir<var 1D /var>...... gelernt.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_030<tab>I never realized talking could be so tiresome.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_030<tab>Meine Zunge ist schwer. So viel habe ich in meinem ganzen Leben noch nicht<var 1D /var>...... gesprochen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_031<tab>I take it you have spoken with everyone, then. Fear not. Your cause is just, and from what <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has told me, your plan is sound.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_031<tab>Was sagen deine Brüder und Schwestern? Werden sie dir folgen? So oder so bin ich zufrieden mit<var 1D /var>...... dir. Du hast gelernt, um Hilfe zu bitten.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_032<tab>We need only wait for the others to assemble.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_032<tab>Jetzt heißt es nur noch abwarten und<var 1D /var>...... sehen, wer kommt.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_0033<tab>It would seem my words have fallen on deaf ears. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We must save Tsukumo on our own.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_0033<tab>Niemand kommt. Ich habe es eben nicht mit Worten. Doch ich bin stark! Ich werde Tsukumo auch all...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_034<tab>You are too quick to judge your brothers, Kabuto. Take another look.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_034<tab>Nur die Ruhe, Kabuto. Gib ihnen noch etwas<var 1D /var>...... Zeit. Da, sieh nur!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_000_035<tab>Sorry to keep you waiting. I thought it prudent we have proper weapons should we be forced to confront the Red, so I made a short trip to visit the Qestir.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_000_035<tab>Entschuldigt die<var 1D /var>...... Verspätung! Ich hatte noch etwas zu erledigen, bei unseren Freunden, den Qestir. Ich habe Waffen mitgebracht.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_036<tab>You traveled all the way to Reunion for weapons!?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_036<tab>Du bist bis in die Azim-Steppe gereist?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIKITAHE_000_037<tab>I paid a visit to the forge in Kugane, and the young smith─Shihoumi, I believe is her name─insisted she be brought here to prepare for Tsukumo's return. She seemed quite adamant about seeing to his repairs.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIKITAHE_000_037<tab>Seid ihr noch hier? Gut. Ich war bei der Schmiedin in Kugane. Sie hat mir gesagt, dass sie bereit steht, um Tsukumo zu reparieren, sobald wir ihn<var 1D /var>...... nach Tamamizu zurückgeholt haben.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_038<tab>Shihoumi! I had nearly forgotten. I know not how to repay you.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_038<tab>I-Ich danke dir, Shikitahe.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_000_039<tab>When a brother is in need, we help. It's as simple as that.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_000_039<tab>Kabuto, es ist doch selbst<var 16 /var>verständ<var 16 /var>lich, dass wir<var 1D /var>...... helfen. Wir arbeiten doch zusammen. Wir sind der Zirkel!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_000_040<tab>Just so. In fact, you'll find more of our brothers are waiting for you outside. Everyone is prepared to do their part to see Tsukumo returned safely.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_000_040<tab>Und draußen vor der Stadt versammeln sich immer mehr, die dir ebenfalls helfen wollen. Wir alle wollen Tsukumo zurückhaben. Du bist nicht<var 1D /var>...... allein.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_000_041<tab>Which is why I scouted ahead, lest we have any unwanted surprises. I overheard the soldiers on watch speaking of Hirumaki.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_000_041<tab>Ich habe mich heimlich auf Zekki umgesehen und einen Wachmann<var 1D /var>...... belauscht. Der Wellengeneral soll sich ständig am Platz der Schätze aufhalten, habe ich gehört.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_000_042<tab>They say he's been gloating over his latest plunder, keeping it on display at the Air of the Opulent. It has to be Tsukumo.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_000_042<tab>Aber Tsukumo, den bewahrt er in seinem Quartier auf. Er will ihn wohl für sich haben. So ein<var 1D /var>...... Lump!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_043<tab>Then I know where I must go.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_043<tab>Zukin, das sind wichtige<var 1D /var>...... Erkenntnisse. Ich werde zum Platz der Schätze gehen und Hirumaki dort stellen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_044<tab>As I mentioned before, your task will be to circle about the island and draw the attention of as many soldiers as you can.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_044<tab>Die anderen werden rund um Zekki für Unruhe sorgen und die Rotpanzer<var 1D /var>...... rauslocken. Damit <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> und ich auf möglichst wenig Widerstand stoßen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_100_044<tab>While they're distracted, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I will sneak onto the island through the Dive.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_100_044<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> und ich werden durch den Unterwasserzugang in das Lager der Rotpanzer eindringen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_045<tab>Today we shall prove the Blue are not to be trifled with.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_045<tab>Zeigen wir den Roten, was in den Kojin aus Tamamizu steckt!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_046<tab>To the Isle of Zekki!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_046<tab>Also los, wir rücken aus. Nach Zekki! Zeigen wir den Roten die Härte unserer Panzer!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_049<tab>You needn't worry about me. I may be old, but with age comes great wisdom. I know enough of battle to handle myself in the field.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_049<tab>Wir sind keine Kriegernaturen wie die Rotpanzer, aber das heißt nicht, dass wir wehrlos sind. Heute ist erneut Gelegenheit, das zu<var 1D /var>...... beweisen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_050<tab>You're here. Good. Everyone is in position.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_050<tab>Bist du so weit?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_051<tab>When we reach the Air of the Opulent, I will see to Hirumaki while you retrieve Tsukumo.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_051<tab>Wir tauchen auf, überraschen die Rotpanzer und kämpfen uns zum Platz der Schätze vor. Ich stelle Hirumaki zum Kampf, du holst dir Tsukumo.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_052<tab>Are you ready?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_052<tab>Jetzt geht es ums<var 1D /var>...... Ganze. Los!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_060<tab>There! It's Hirumaki, and he has Tsukumo!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_060<tab>Da! Tsukumo! Und Hirumaki!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIKITAHE_000_061<tab>The soldiers are all taking to the water. Now is your chance.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIKITAHE_000_061<tab>Wir haben falsche Fährten gelegt. Im Lager herrscht ein schönes<var 1D /var>...... Durcheinander. Mehr können wir nicht mehr tun. Schnell, eine bessere Chance, Tsukumo zu schnappen, bekommen wir nicht!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_062<tab>Thank you. All of you. I promise this opportunity will not be wasted.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_062<tab>Bleibt zurück.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_063<tab>Fall back and join the others. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will handle the rest.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_063<tab>Ab hier übernehme<var 1D /var>...... ich.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_000_064<tab>Understood. Good luck, and may the kami keep you safe.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_000_064<tab>Überlassen wir das Kämpfen den<var 1D /var>...... Kämpfern.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_000_065<tab>We have faith in you, Kabuto.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_000_065<tab>Wenn jemand den Wellengeneral besiegen kann, dann Kabuto und <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_HIRUMAKI_000_066<tab>So you've come after all. Shaugi, why don't you entertain our guests?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_HIRUMAKI_000_066<tab>Ha ha ha ha haaa! Eure Freunde lassen euch im<var 1D /var>...... Stich. Es wird euch noch leidtun, hierher<var 16 /var>ge<var 16 /var>kommen zu sein. Ihr werdet es bereuen, je eure im Sand verbuddelten Eierschalen verlassen zu haben! Shaugi!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_100_066<tab>With pleasure.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_100_066<tab>Ich schicke die Eindringlinge in den Ewigen<var 1D /var>...... Strudel, Wellengeneral!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_067<tab>Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. He stands no chance against the both of us.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_067<tab>Los! Wir knacken diesem Großmaul gemeinsam den Panzer.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_HIRUMAKI_000_070<tab>I've had enough of your meddling! I will rip your heads from your shoulders and mount them on the walls of the vault!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_HIRUMAKI_000_070<tab>Der Helm des Blauen und <var 08 E4E94502 ((das Schwert)) ((<var 08 E4E94503 ((die Faustwaffe)) ((<var 08 E4E94504 ((die Axt)) ((<var 08 E4E94505 ((die Lanze)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((der Bogen)) ((<var 08 E4E94507 ((der Zauberstab)) ((<var 08 E4E94508 ((der Zauberstab)) ((<var 08 E4E94514 ((das Schwert und der Schild)) ((<var 08 E4E94515 ((die Schlagringe)) ((<var 08 E4E94516 ((die Axt)) ((<var 08 E4E94517 ((die Lanze)) ((<var 08 E4E94518 ((der Bogen)) ((<var 08 E4E94519 ((der Zauberstab)) ((<var 08 E4E9451A ((der Zauberstab)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((das Zauberbuch)) ((<var 08 E4E9451C ((das Zauberbuch)) ((<var 08 E4E9451D ((das Zauberbuch)) ((<var 08 E4E9451E ((die Messer)) ((<var 08 E4E9451F ((die Messer)) ((<var 08 E4E94520 ((die Pistole)) ((<var 08 E4E94521 ((der Zweihänder)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((der Globus)) ((<var 08 E4E94523 ((das Katana)) ((<var 08 E4E94524 ((das Rapier)) ((<var 08 E4E94525 ((das Zauberbuch)) ((<var 08 E4E94526 ((die Revolver<var 16 /var>klinge)) ((<var 08 E4E94527 ((die Wurfwaffe)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> <var 08 E905 ((der Abenteurerin)) ((des Abenteurers)) /var> werden einen schönen Platz in meiner Privatsammlung einnehmen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_071<tab>Hurry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. See to Tsukumo!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_071<tab>Ich übernehm den hier! Du holst Tsukumo!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_100_071<tab>Prepare yourself!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_100_071<tab>Du hast deine letzte Flut erlebt, Roter. Bereite dich auf dein Ende vor!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_HIRUMAKI_000_072<tab>Is that the best you can do?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_HIRUMAKI_000_072<tab>Mein Ende? Nicht so voreilig. Nimm das! Uaaaaaah!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_HIRUMAKI_100_072<tab>This is your last chance. Join me or die along with the rest of the Blue.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_HIRUMAKI_100_072<tab>Gib auf, und ich lasse dich am<var 1D /var>...... Leben. Damit du mit ansehen kannst, wie ich Tamamizu dem Meeresboden gleichmache!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_101_072<tab>Ugh...
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_101_072<tab>A... Argh ...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_TSUKUMO_000_073<tab>(-???-)GeT uP...
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_TSUKUMO_000_073<tab>(-Hohe Stimme-)Kabutobutobutototo<var 1D /var>... Steh auauauf<var 1D /var>... fff<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_TSUKUMO_000_074<tab>ThE oThErS...cOuNtInG oN yOu...
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_TSUKUMO_000_074<tab>Fürürürür<var 1D /var>... deinen Stammammamm<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_TSUKUMO_000_075<tab>My WoRk...iS DoNe. FoLlOw...YoUr HeArT.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_TSUKUMO_000_075<tab>Ich kann nnnichts mehr für dddich tunununun<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_TSUKUMO_000_076<tab>I wIlL...aLwAyS...
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_TSUKUMO_000_076<tab>Vergiss nichtichticht<var 1D /var>... Die Bbb... die Banbanban... die Bande der Fff<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_077<tab>Tsukumo!!!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_077<tab>Tsukumooo!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_REDZAKO02977_000_078<tab>(-Red Kojin Soldiers-)General Hirumaki has fallen! Retreat! Retreat!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_REDZAKO02977_000_078<tab>(-Rotpanzer-Soldat-)Der Wellengeneral ist gefallen! Flieht! Flieht!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_079<tab>Quickly. We must take him back to Tamamizu.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_000_079<tab>Schnell! Bringt Kabuto zurück nach<var 1D /var>...... Tamamizu.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_089<tab>I apologize if I've worried you. I am fine, but there is still no change in Tsukumo.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_089<tab>Wir sind wieder zurück. Ich habe mich vom Kampf<var 1D /var>...... erholt. Aber Tsukumo<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_090<tab>He's remained lifeless since he last spoke on the Isle of Zekki.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_090<tab>Sieh nur<var 1D /var>... Er ist steif wie ein toter<var 1D /var>...... Korallenarm.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_091<tab>Shihoumi. Can you repair him?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_091<tab>Shihomi! Kannst du etwas für Tsukumo tun? Kannst du ihn<var 1D /var>...... reparieren?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_092<tab>I'm sorry. There doesn't seem to be anything wrong with him, physically.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_092<tab>Ich habe schon alles versucht, Herr Kabuto. Jedes Zahnrad und jede Feder seines Uhrwerks habe ich mir angesehen, aber ich habe keinen Defekt gefunden.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_093<tab>I could grant him movement, but only such as an ordinary karakuri puppet might have.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_093<tab>Wenn ihr wollt, kann ich die Marionette aufziehen, dann führt sie ein Tänzchen auf oder plappert ein paar Sätze. Aber es wäre nicht Tsukumo<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_094<tab>Tsukumo is no ordinary puppet. He is of the divine!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_094<tab>Nein! Wir brauchen den Tsukumo-Kami zurück! <var 1A 02 /var>Ich<var 1A 01 /var> brauche Tsukumo!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_095<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You have dealt with matters of magic before, yes? Do you know of anything that might restore Tsukumo?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_095<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Gibt es nichts, was du tun<var 1D /var>...... kannst?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_Q2_000_000<tab>Was antwortest du?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_A2_000_001<tab>But why? He has already served his purpose.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_A2_000_001<tab>Lass, Kabuto. Tsukumo hat seinen Dienst getan.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_A2_000_002<tab>But why? Have you forgotten Tsukumo's parting message?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_A2_000_002<tab>Du brauchst Tsukumo nicht. Erinnere dich an seine Worte.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_096<tab>How can you say that? There's still so much we've yet to do.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_096<tab>Seinen Dienst getan, sagst du?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_097<tab>His parting message? You say that as if his intention was to leave.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_097<tab>Ich brauche ihn nicht, sagst du?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_098<tab>What's this? Did it fall from Tsukumo's altar?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_098<tab>Was ist das?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_099<tab>How could I have overlooked such a thing while examining him? Hmmm. It bears a striking resemblance to materia...
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_099<tab>Nanu? Das funkelt ja genauso wie<var 1D /var>... ein Stück Materia!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_100<tab>Of course! Materia is essentially spiritual energy in crystallized form. It was likely used to make Tsukumo's core.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_100<tab>Hm ... Materia ist die kristallisierte Form von Gedanken und Erfahrungen. Wenn sich diese Kugel in Tsukumos Innerem geformt hat<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN000_101<tab>Are you saying it was this materia that gave him life?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN000_101<tab>Du meinst, dass sich Tsukumos Gedanken in dieser Kugel<var 1D /var>...... befinden?

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_102<tab>Precisely. And I have an idea as to how we may still put it to use. Would you sit down for a moment?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_102<tab>Ja, das kann man so sagen. Herr Kabuto, setz dich doch mal einen Moment hin.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_103<tab>A perfect fit.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_103<tab>Fertig! Sitzt wie angegossen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_104<tab>It suits your helmet quite nicely.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SHIHOUMI_000_104<tab>Gute Freund<var 16 /var>schaften gibt das Leben nur selten her. Wie die Perle einer Muschel schlummern sie gut behütet und fest verschlossen, bis zwei sich trauen, die Schalen ihrer Herzen aufzustemmen, um in ihrem Glanz zu erleuchten.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_105<tab>Thank you, Shihoumi. I will treasure it always.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_105<tab>Gut gesprochen, Shihomi. Ich danke<var 1D /var>...... dir.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_106<tab>Tsukumo. You lent your voice when I could not find my own, your courage when I had only cowardice.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_106<tab>Tsukumo. Er hat mir so viel geholfen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_107<tab>Thanks to you, I now understand the strength that comes from the bonds I share with others.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_107<tab>Ich habe gedacht, dass ich auf jede Hilfe verzichten kann. Weil ich ein mächtiger Krieger<var 1D /var>...... bin.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_108<tab>Before I might have thrown this materia away, but now...
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_108<tab>Doch er hat mich gelehrt, worauf es wirklich<var 1D /var>...... ankommt.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_109<tab>Now I would honor Tsukumo's memory by protecting the vault, and the allies that have helped us fill it.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_000_109<tab>Hört, meine Brüder und Schwestern. Ich werde für alle Zeiten die Bande der Freund<var 16 /var>schaft ehren, die die Blaupanzer mit ihren Freunden nah und fern verbinden, und über die Schätze wachen, welche in der blauen Schatzkammer von Tamamizu ruhen. Und ich bitte euch: Helft mir dabei, mit all eurer Kraft!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>Thanks to your concerted efforts with Kabuto, Tsukumo now rests peacefully in the treasure vault.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>Der Zirkel hat mit vereinten Kräften einen weiteren würdigen Schatz beschafft: Tsukumo! Damit ist die Schatzkammer von Tamamizu nun reich gefüllt!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sworn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Kojin.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>Dein Verhältnis zu den Blaupanzern ist auf „Solidarisch“ gestiegen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>Furthermore, you will receive an experience point bonus upon the completion of the Kojin beast tribe daily quests.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>Für abgeschlossene Aufträge der Kojin erhältst du noch mehr Routine als zuvor.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>New Kojin beast tribe daily quests are now available from Zukin at Tamamizu.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>Außerdem kannst du bei Shikitahe neue Waren für den Verbundenheitsrang „Solidarisch“ erwerben.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Follow Kabuto.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Folge Kabuto!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_QIB_002_TODO_1<tab>Harness the treasures' powers and make for the Air of the Opulent.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_QIB_002_TODO_1Empfange den Segen der Kami und
dringe zum Platz der Schätze vor!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_QIB_007_TODO_1<tab>Defeat Shaugi.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_QIB_007_TODO_1<tab>Besiege Shaugi!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>The path is clear. Come, this way!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>Kaum Wachen. Dann hatten meine Brüder und Schwestern also Erfolg mit dem<var 1D /var>...... Ablenkungsmanöver.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>What is he doing here?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>Da. Der Stammesälteste. Dann müssen die anderen auch hier<var 1D /var>...... sein.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>I brought treasures from the vault to aid you. Align yourself with the kami within and they shall grant you their blessings.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Ich habe die Schätze unseres Stammes<var 1D /var>...... mitgebracht. Sie werden dir die Kraft der Kami verleihen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>I... I've never felt such power! With this we should have all we need to stop any in our way.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>Die Kami haben dir ihren Segen<var 1D /var>...... geschenkt. Los, weiter.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_BATTLETALK_001_005<tab>Makura waits for you within bearing more of our treasures. Go now, and may the kami protect you.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_BUNCHIN_BATTLETALK_001_005<tab>Ich habe noch mehr Schätze aus Tamamizu<var 1D /var>...... versteckt. Sie werden euch<var 1D /var>...... stark machen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>Onward, to the Air of the Opulent!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>Weiter, zum Platz der Schätze!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>By the kami! They should be out in the water, not here fighting. We have to help them!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Unsere Freunde! Wir müssen ihnen<var 1D /var>...... helfen!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Kabuto! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank goodness you're here.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ZUKIN_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Kabuto und <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Ihr kommt zur rechten<var 1D /var>...... Zeit.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_BATTLETALK_003_005<tab>That seems to be the last of them. We'll keep the way clear. Hurry and save Tsukumo!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_VOLUNTEER02977_BATTLETALK_003_005<tab>Danke für die<var 1D /var>...... Hilfe. Die schwimmen jetzt im Ewigen Strudel.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_BATTLETALK_003_006<tab>Before you go, come and partake of this treasure's blessing.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_BATTLETALK_003_006<tab>Kabuto, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, hier entlang. Der Älteste hat noch einen Schatz<var 1D /var>...... versteckt.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_003_004<tab>Thank you. I fear we will need it for what lies ahead.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_003_004<tab>Folge Makura und empfange den Segen der<var 1D /var>...... Kami. Du wirst ihn brauchen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_BATTLETALK_003_008<tab>Go quickly now. We will keep them at bay for as long as we can.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_BATTLETALK_003_008<tab>Geh jetzt weiter. Aber vorsichtig, da vorne sind noch mehr<var 1D /var>...... Rote.

source:
TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_003_001Thank you, Makura.
Come, )) (( )) 02 /var>. We mustn't waste this opportunity.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>Es sind weniger Wachen als<var 1D /var>...... sonst. Der Zirkel hat gute Arbeit geleistet.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>Curses! I wasn't expecting such numbers.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>Ich rieche<var 1D /var>...... Rote. Verschaffe mir etwas Zeit, damit ich die Kraft meines Schwertes bündeln kann.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_006<tab>If they would stand against us, then we have no choice. Lead on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_006<tab>Angriff, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_005<tab>Draw them together, and I will deliver the finishing blow!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_005<tab>Mit hundert Schnitten werde ich sie<var 1D /var>...... niederstrecken. Locke sie genau vor meine Klinge.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>Reinforcements!? Distract them that I might strike again.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>Da, eine ganze Welle! Du weißt, was du zu tun hast. Lock sie<var 1D /var>...... her!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_003<tab>There's no end to them! I fear I only have strength enough for one last attack.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_003<tab>Seine Leibgarde. Hirumaki ist nicht mehr<var 1D /var>...... weit. Komm, wir machen es noch einmal wie eben!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_004<tab>Well done. Now let's get moving. It shouldn't be much farther.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_004_004<tab>Den Rest erledige ich Kröte zu Kröte.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ENEMY_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>Intruders! Stop them!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_ENEMY_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>Stoppt die<var 1D /var>...... Eindringlinge!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>I...can't move. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, help!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>Ein Zauber! Befreie mich, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>I'm free! Now to dispense with these red-shelled fiends.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>Danke, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Jetzt schälen wir sie aus ihren weichen<var 1D /var>...... Schalen!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>The Air of the Opulent is just ahead. Once inside you mustn't let down your guard.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>Alle erledigt. Jetzt zum Platz der Schätze. Dort wartet Hirumaki auf<var 1D /var>...... uns.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_BATTLETALK_006_001<tab>Wait, Kabuto! We've prepared one last treasure to aid you in your fight against Hirumaki.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_BATTLETALK_006_001<tab>Wartet! Hier hat der Älteste noch einen Schatz<var 1D /var>...... versteckt!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_BATTLETALK_006_002<tab>It's right around this corner.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_MAKURA_BATTLETALK_006_002<tab>Folge mir und empfange den<var 1D /var>...... Segen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_006_002<tab>With this last blessing we should have all the strength we need. Let's put an end to Hirumaki and his schemes.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_006_002Liebe Makura, du bist mutiger als die meisten unserer...... Brüder.
Los, holen wir uns Tsukumo zurück.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_001<tab>How dare you raise your blade against General Hirumaki. Yours will be a slow and painful death!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_001<tab>Der Wellengeneral macht sich das Schwert nicht mit dem Blut von Weichlingen<var 1D /var>...... schmutzig. Die Drecksarbeit übernehme<var 1D /var>...... ich!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_002<tab>If we're to save Tsukumo he has to be stopped.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Zuerst die Leibwache des Wellengenerals!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_004<tab>Hmph. Let's see how you handle this!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_004<tab>Jetzt reicht es<var 1D /var>...... mir!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_005<tab>Quickly! We must destroy these spheres before they burst.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_005<tab>Die Kugeln! Zerstöre die Kugeln!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_006<tab>We will suffer your intrusion no longer!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_006<tab>Jaaa! Zuerst der Störenfried aus Tamamizu, dann knöpfe ich mir <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((den)) /var> <var 09 E948 ((Hyuran)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafell)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var><var 1D /var>...... vor.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_007<tab>To me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We must bear this attack together.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_007<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, zu mir!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_021<tab>Gah! For a blessing I survived, but I dare not suffer another alone.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_021<tab>Argh ... Das war zu viel<var 1D /var>...... für einen. Jetzt liegt es ganz an dir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_023<tab>It will take more than some feeble spring shower to defeat us, Shaugi.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_023<tab>Gut! Wir haben ihn<var 1D /var>...... ausgetrickst!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_008<tab>I've had enough of this wet nurse of yours. Begone with you!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_008<tab>SCHLUSS JETZT! Das ist euer<var 1D /var>...... Ende!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_010<tab>His strength is waning, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Keep it up!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, schnell, zu mir! Jetzt wird es<var 1D /var>...... ernst.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_009<tab>Fools! You cannot defeat the Red!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_009<tab>ICH HABE<var 1D /var>...... GENUG!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_011<tab>The water spouts─they're protecting him!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_011<tab>Der Feigling versteckt sich hinter den Wirbeln!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_014<tab>Enough games. This time I will end you!
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_014<tab>Macht euch bereit, vor die Kami zu treten! Es ist Zeit für die<var 1D /var>...... Geheimwaffe der Rotpanzer!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_013<tab>Why! Why won't you die!?
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_013<tab>Wie kann das sein?! Die Rotpanzer sind doch stärker als die<var 1D /var>...... Blauen!

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_020<tab>It seems the tide has turned in our favor.
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_020<tab>Mach weiter, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Für Tsukumo.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_024<tab>Forgive me... General...
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_SYAGI_BATTLETALK_007_024<tab>Wellengeneral, verzeiht<var 1D /var>...... mir.

source: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_012<tab>No... Not like this...
target: TEXT_BANKJN005_02977_KABUTO_BATTLETALK_007_012<tab>Die Kami haben mich<var 1D /var>...... verlassen.
